original_text: Imprimir y compartir (PDF 1439 KB) En inglés Datos básicos sobre el dormir La mayoría de los adultos necesitan de siete a ocho horas de sueño todas las noches. Pero no todas las personas duermen todo ...

qa_pairs.text_input: What are some common causes of occasional sleep difficulties?
qa_pairs.output: Stress, health issues, medications, excessive work hours/shift work, light or noise, alcohol or heavy meals close to bedtime.

qa_pairs.text_input: What type of medication can help with sleep?
qa_pairs.output: Prescription and over-the-counter (OTC) medications are available to aid sleep.

qa_pairs.text_input: What are some ways to improve sleep habits?
qa_pairs.output: Establish a regular sleep-wake cycle, create a dark and quiet sleep environment, avoid caffeine and nicotine before bed, engage in relaxing activities before sleep, avoid late afternoon naps, and limit food intake close to bedtime.
